LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Eveque.label: sacred guardian
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Eveque.descriptio: Emanates an aura of unshakeable faith and wields illumination rites.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Eveque.degreeData: Masters divine light and regenerates in critical moments.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Goblu.label: flower protector
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Goblu.description: Swift and defends his flower field at all costs.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_SakapatateRobuste: An armored plant mass, slow to wound but quick to strike.
Slowly regenerates wounds and deploys energy shields.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Dualiste.label: incarnate duality
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Dualiste.degreeDa: Alternates between blinding light bursts and psychic darkness.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Francois.label: territorial turtle
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Francois.descript: A giant melancholic turtle that jealously protects his territory and precious stones.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Francois.degreeDa: This bioluminescent turtle jealously guards his mineral treasures. Despite his gruff attitude, deep sadness haunts him since separation from Clea.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_MaitreLampes.desc: Controls lighting, summons spectral lamps and burns enemies.
Increases his troops' strength and executes coordinated strikes.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Sirene.label: abyssal voice
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Sirene.descriptio: Emits sonic waves and manipulates mortal minds.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Visages.label: bearer of a thousand masks
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Visages.descripti: Changes identity to confuse adversaries and distort reality.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Paintress.label: cosmic muse
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Paintress.descrip: Paints danger zones and channels the power of the Monolith.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Verso.label: broken immortal
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Verso.description: Regenerates wounds and fractures enemy defenses.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Verso.degreeDatas: Survivor of Expedition Zero with extraordinary abilities.
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Mime.label: silent shadow
LanguageData.Expedition33_BossTrait_Mime.description: Creates zones of silence and invisible barriers.
LanguageData.ExpeditionVeteran.label: expedition veteran
LanguageData.ExpeditionVeteran.description: This person has survived several expeditions against The Gommage. They possess valuable experience but bear the psychological scars of their missions.
LanguageData.ExpeditionVeteran.degreeDatas.vtran.desc: Has participated in several expeditions and gained experience from them.
LanguageData.ExpeditionVeteran.degreeDatas.vtran_ague: A hardened survivor of numerous perilous expeditions.
LanguageData.GommagePhobia.label: gommage phobia
LanguageData.GommagePhobia.description: This person has an irrational fear of the Gommage phenomenon and cursed numbers.
LanguageData.GommagePhobia.degreeDatas.anxieux.label: anxious
LanguageData.GommagePhobia.degreeDatas.anxieux.descri: Feels constant anxiety related to the Gommage.
LanguageData.GommagePhobia.degreeDatas.terroris.label: terrified
LanguageData.GommagePhobia.degreeDatas.terroris.descr: Lives in constant terror of being erased.
